meaning_str.bing:
n. 幸福；愉快；(用语等的)适当；〈古〉幸运
网络. 快乐；幸福感；爱我就让我快乐

幸福；愉快；(用语等的)适当；〈古〉幸运
快乐；幸福感；爱我就让我快乐

1.en: A growing number of people are beginning to realize that wealth is not the sole prerequisite for happiness.
1.cn: 越来越多的人开始意识到财富不是幸福的惟一先决条件。

2.en: Just how that bit of happiness turns into a habit involves a pleasure-sensing chemical named dopamine.
2.cn: 由于存在能感知幸福的化学物质——多巴胺，所以一点点快感就能变成习惯。

3.en: The inherent happiness and a sense of satisfaction is the best reward of voluntary work to us, superior to any other kind of happiness.
3.cn: 内心的快乐和满足感是志愿者服务对于我们最好的回报，超越了其他任何一种快乐。

0.en: Yes, we. There's a new happiness exhibit at the Museum of Happiness that I'm dying to see.
0.cn: 对，我们听说这个幸福快乐博物馆新办了一个幸福画展，我很想去看看。

1.en: This part of my life, this little part, is called Happiness.
1.cn: 我人生的这部分这个小阶段叫做"幸福"。

2.en: Secondly, that I am convinced it will add greatly to my happiness.
2.cn: 其次，我深信结婚会大大地促进我的幸福。

3.en: Thomas Jefferson mentions happiness a couple times in the Declaration of Independence.
3.cn: 托马斯杰斐逊在"独立宣言"中几次提及"幸福"这个词。

4.en: Do you think anything might tempt me to accept the man who has ruined perhaps forever the happiness of a most beloved sister?
4.cn: 一个毁我最亲爱的姐姐幸福的人怎么会打动我的心去爱他呢？

5.en: Well, you should. 50% of marriages end in divorce, but 100% of make your own sundae bars end in happiness.
5.cn: 那我建议你弄一个，五成的婚姻都是以离婚告终，但十成十的圣代自助吧都是以幸福收场。

6.en: So your dragon... It's god. It's kind, It's benevolent? Yeah. Also, bring all the good luck, money, happiness to people.
6.cn: 你们的龙...它是神。是和善仁慈的。是的。也给人带来好运，财运，还有幸福。

7.en: Phoebe and Mike are perfect for each other. And I know I speak for everyone here when I wish them a lifetime of happiness.
7.cn: 菲比和迈克是完美的一对儿。我相信在场的每一个人都会和我一样祝愿他们一生幸福。

8.en: It is, it's mostly happiness, joy, luck. Actually, we've got you a favor. I've got my personal shopping assistant, Mr. Ant.
8.cn: 没错，它代表着幸福，快乐，好运，其实，我们帮了你一个忙，我让我的私人购物助理买的，安特先生。

9.en: Okay. Let me see here. Okay, kidding aside. Howard, you are a good friend. And I wish you nothing but happiness. Bazinga, I don't!
9.cn: 好，再看看这个。好了，不说笑了，霍华德，你是一个益友，我希望你幸福美满。逗你玩，我才不呢！

10.en: When you are triumphant, happiness will come. You're certain? I am.
10.cn: 胜利会给您带来快乐的。你确定？我确定。

11.en: It gives us certain happiness that we just don't get other purchases.
11.cn: 我们从中得到的快乐是从别的物品得不到的。

12.en: Maybe he's just happy. Happiness isn't my concern. Not now, not ever.
12.cn: 也许他只是开心罢了。我不担心开心。现在不，从来都不。

13.en: I never thought a small piece of shade could bring me so much happiness.
13.cn: 我从来没有想到这点东西却带给我如此多的快乐。

14.en: But it also leaves us a lot of trouble in particular things like envy and our happiness.
14.cn: 但它也带来许多负面影响特别是嫉妒和我们的满足感。

15.en: Your happiness is not just derived about what you have. It's derived what you have related to other things.
15.cn: 你的满足感不仅来自自己所拥有的，还与其他因素有关。

16.en: And it's unbelievable to think that our happiness is not determined by what we have, but what we don't have.
16.cn: 很难想象我们的满足感不是来自我们拥有的东西，而是没有得到的。

17.en: Welcome to the debate team. We're happy to have you. I disagree for the following reasons. True happiness is... Hey there!
17.cn: 欢迎来到辩论队，期待你们加入。我因下列理由反对，真正的快乐是一种理论概念-你好

18.en: My temperature is back to happiness. And to show I do not hold against you any grudge-ment, I have brought you delicious snacking.
18.cn: 我的体温已恢复到快乐的水平。为了表示我对你没有任何的不满，我给你带来了可口的点心。

19.en: Maybe because I'm so interesting all by myself. With that being said, may you find as much happiness with each other as I find on my own.
19.cn: 或许我自己太有意思，无需他人陪伴，所以，我祝你们在对方身上得到的快乐与我给自己的一样多。
